title: Scientific Inquiry Methods Through Artistic Experimentation and Improvisational Research

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental grasp of scientific inquiry methods
context.additional_context: Professionals experience applying artistic experimental methodologies to scientific research, conducting participatory activities via smartphone-based platforms in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can define open-ended scientific research questions using improvisational approaches from art experiments
Learners can attempt methodological innovation beyond existing knowledge by designing and conducting creative experiments under constrained conditions
Learners can develop evaluation criteria reflecting relational characteristics (participatory nature, contextuality) of experiments and improvisational research through collaboration with peers

resources: Basic Art Materials (Paper, Colored Pencils, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
